name: Derhier Elementar 2: Derhier Minigames
description:
Derhier Elementars 2: Derhier Minigames is a local multiplayer mini game collection.

You can play against 3 of your friends to decide who is the strongest Derhier Elementar in the universe.

  • 8 mini games
  • many game modes
  • gamepad support
  • catchy soundtrack
  • never before seen mini games

Feedback welcome!
